problem.markdown:
>>When using the VLOOKUP function, what is the purpose of the fourth parameter?<<
( ) Provide the value to be found. ( ) Provide a table array where the value should be retrieved. ( ) Provide a column number in the table array from which the matching value should be returned. (x) Provide a logical value whether to find an exact match or the closest match.
[explanation] The last parameter is an optional parameter which takes in a logical value that specifies whether you want VLOOKUP to find an exact match or an approximate match. [explanation]
problem.p: When using the VLOOKUP function, what is the purpose of the fourth parameter?
